doc:
Angus Scrimm https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Angus_Scrimm 0 Angus Scrimm (born Lawrence Rory Guy; August 19, 1926 – January 9, 2016) was an American actor, author, and journalist, best known for portrayal of the Tall Man in the 1979 horror film Phantasm and its sequels. Angus_Scrimm ( born Lawrence_Rory_Guy ; August_19_,_1926 – January_9_,_2016 ) was an_American_actor , author , and journalist , best_known for portrayal of the_Tall_Man in the_1979_horror_film Phantasm and its_sequels .
